post:
RT 🚨 If you use Microsoft Exchange on-premises and recently patched 🚨 

I strongly recommend you run the following 👉🏽 free tool 👈🏽 on each server to 🕵️‍♀️ find and 🚮 remove planted webshells (backdoor access 🥷) which can persist even after patching. 

https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/security/threat-protection/intelligence/safety-scanner-download(https://t.co/eBvBYvb4Lo)

RT Black Kingdom #ransomware is hunting unpatched #Microsoft Exchange servers affected by #ProxyLogon vulnerabilities.

Read: https://thehackernews.com/2021/03/black-kingdom-ransomware-hunting.html(https://t.co/jmITJWXYcq)

#infosec #cybersecurity
